casebody.data:
First Department,

July, 1940.

(July 5, 1940.) Howard W. Lyon and Others v. Charles R. Holton and Others and William A. Mitchell and Others.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied, with ten dollars costs. Present — Martin, P. J., O’Malley, Glennon, Cohn and Callahan, JJ.
